item.title: Markdown
item.description: Hugo Markdown Support footnote Here's a simple footnote,[^1] and here's a longer one.[^bignote] [^1]: This is the first footnote. code block To create code blocks, indent every line of the block by at least four spaces or one tab. fenced code block The basic Markdown syntax allows you to create code blocks by indenting lines by four spaces or one tab. If you find that inconvenient, try using fenced code blocks.
